text: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West had a date night on Friday night at the high - end sushi stop Nobu Malibu. It was just the two of them, and this event came to shut down rumors according to which they are planning to get divorced. Went to see Dave Chappelle this night and laughed all night long. Sometimes u just need a good laugh session with your friends! A post shared by Kim Kardashian West ( @ kimkardashian ) on Oct 31, 2017 at 10 : 47am PDT Kim wore a skintight bodycon dress and kept the accessories to a minimum with a pair of gold chain necklaces. The reality star paired the simple look with a sexy pair of lace - up stilettos by Merah Vodianova. Kany
